price: Kuma Muka ɓuɓɓugar da ƙasã ta zama idãnun ruwa, daɗa ruwa ya haɗu a kan wani umarni da aka riga aka ƙaddara shi.
arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wafajjarnā al-arḍa ʿuyūnan fal-taqā al-māu ʿalā amrin qad qudira
